title: Ultra-large dipole moment organic cation derived 3D/2D p-n heterojunction for high-efficiency carbon-based perovskite solar cells
content:

The hole transport layer (HTL)-free carbon electrode-based perovskite solar cells (C-PSCs) possess promising commercial application potential due to the fascinating advantages of low cost and high stability. However, the large...
